SELECT j.*, k.app_count/t2.root_path_count AS app_count FROM iam_application j JOIN ( SELECT ia.id, count(ia.id) AS app_count FROM iam_application ia JOIN ( SELECT iae.* FROM iam_application_exploration iae JOIN ( SELECT i.path FROM iam_application_exploration i WHERE i.application_id = #{id} ) t ON 1=1 WHERE iae.path LIKE concat(t.path,'%') ) temp ON ia.id = temp.APPLICATION_ID WHERE ia.APPLICATION_CATEGORY = #{category} GROUP BY ia.id )k ON j.id = k.id JOIN ( SELECT count(t1.application_id) AS root_path_count FROM iam_application_exploration t1 WHERE t1.application_id = #{id} ) t2 ON 1=1 WHERE 1=1
AND j.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND j.code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{code}),'%')
SELECT iae.* FROM iam_application_exploration iae JOIN ( SELECT i.path FROM iam_application_exploration i WHERE i.application_id = #{id} ) t ON 1=1 WHERE iae.path LIKE concat(t.path,'%')

SELECT DISTINCT iae.APPLICATION_ID, iae.parent_id, SUBSTR(iae.path,POSITION(CONCAT(CONCAT('/',#{id}), '/') IN iae.path), LENGTH(iae.path)) AS path, ia.name application_name, ia.code application_code, ia.application_category application_category, ia.application_type application_type, ia.is_enabled application_enabled, ia.project_id project_id FROM iam_application_exploration iae JOIN ( SELECT i.path FROM iam_application_exploration i WHERE i.application_id = #{id} ) t ON 1=1 JOIN iam_application ia ON iae.APPLICATION_ID = ia.id WHERE iae.path LIKE concat(t.path,'%') AND iae.application_id != #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT iae.APPLICATION_ID, iae.parent_id, SUBSTR(iae.path,INSTR(iae.path, CONCAT(CONCAT('/',#{id}), '/'), 1), LENGTH(iae.path)) AS path, ia.name application_name, ia.code application_code, ia.application_category application_category, ia.application_type application_type, ia.is_enabled application_enabled, ia.project_id project_id FROM iam_application_exploration iae JOIN ( SELECT i.path FROM iam_application_exploration i WHERE i.application_id = #{id} ) t ON 1=1 JOIN iam_application ia ON iae.APPLICATION_ID = ia.id WHERE iae.path LIKE concat(t.path,'%') AND iae.application_id != #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT iae.APPLICATION_ID, iae.parent_id, SUBSTRING(iae.path,CHARINDEX(CONCAT(CONCAT('/',#{id}), '/'), iae.path), LEN(iae.path)) AS path, ia.name application_name, ia.code application_code, ia.application_category application_category, ia.application_type application_type, ia.is_enabled application_enabled, ia.project_id project_id FROM iam_application_exploration iae JOIN ( SELECT i.path FROM iam_application_exploration i WHERE i.application_id = #{id} ) t ON 1=1 JOIN iam_application ia ON iae.APPLICATION_ID = ia.id WHERE iae.path LIKE concat(t.path,'%') AND iae.application_id != #{id}
